original_text: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
korean_text: 집에 들어가시매 제자들이 조용히 묻자오되 우리는 어찌하여 능히 그 귀신을 쫓아내지 못하였나이까

sentences.original_text: And when he was come into the house
Why could not we cast him out?
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 우리는 그를 쫓아낼 수 없었습니까?
